channel.title: Docker on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: Notes on Docker
item.description: Docker is a fascinating concept that could be potentially useful in many ways, especially in Data science, and making reproducible workflows / environments. There are several articles which have great introductions and examples of using docker in data science This is an evolving summary of my exploration with Docker. It should prove to be a handy refresher of commands and concepts. TODO What is Docker A brief summary of what Docker is all about.
